original_text: He built twenty cubits of the rear of the house with boards of cedar from the floor to the walls, and he built this within as an inner sanctuary, as the Most Holy Place.
korean_text: 또 성전 뒤쪽에서부터 이십 규빗 되는 곳에 마루에서 천장까지 백향목 널판으로 가로막아 성전의 내소 곧 지성소를 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: He built twenty cubits of the rear of the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 집의 뒤쪽 이십 규빗을 지었는데

sentences.original_text: with boards of cedar from the floor to the walls
